description: An array of all of the actions produced by a single app

$eref.description: the logical information needed to populate a button/control at runtime

_88gateState.description: for actions that are apply gates, true if the gate has been passed for this specific candidate + job, false if it was failed - this field should only be present when there is a result

_88name.description: fixed name for this action, containing only lower case alpha, digits and '-' characters, length <= 30

___name.description: fixed name for this action, containing only lower case alpha, digits and '-' characters, length <= 30

___textColor.description: the color that the button's text should be rendered in, in 6 character hex format without leading #, e.g. 00ff00

___disabled.description: true if the button/control should appear disabled, i.e. the action can be seen but not performed

___backgroundColor.description: the color that the button's background should be rendered in, in 6 character hex format without leading #, e.g. 00ff00

___imageUri.description: the url of an image to be displayed for this action (i.e. instead of a dynamically set up button)

___uri.description: the url that the button/control will redirect the user to when pressed, or use to populate an iframe inside a modal

___label.description: a string indicating what the action will do, used as the label on its button/control
